songs.title: Hello Neighbor
songs.lyrics:
[Chorus]
Hello neighbor, why you are looking so uptight?
(Uptight, uptight)
I ain’t going to rob you, and I ain’t going to bother you
So, tell me neighbor, why you are looking so uptight?
(Uptight, uptight)
No, I ain’t better than drugs in your residence
Hello neighbor, why you are looking so uptight?
(Uptight, uptight)
I ain’t going to rob you, and I ain’t going to bother you
So, tell me neighbor, why you are looking so uptight?
(Uptight, uptight)
No, I ain’t better than drugs in your residence

[Verse 1]
We all mess up sometimes
But you can make corrections sometimes
Everybody needs to have directions sometimes
Cause you can only live this one time (oh shit)
Tell me neighbor, why you are looking so uptight?
Is it cause I’m fly, or is it because you despise
They fear young nigga getting bread to the skies
Don’t look at my clothes, it’s just a disguise
Somewhat we nap and root it, we got the baddest buddhist
We just be rapping music, you all will just be clapping to it
I get down, I get down, before this song is over
You’ll lose six pounds, six pounds
So how they do it to ya?

[Chorus]
Hello neighbor, why you are looking so uptight?
(Uptight, uptight)
I ain’t going to rob you, and I ain’t going to bother you
So, tell me neighbor, why you are looking so uptight?
(Uptight, uptight)
No, I ain’t better than drugs in your residence
Hello neighbor, why you are looking so uptight?
(Uptight, uptight)
I ain’t going to rob you, and I ain’t going to bother you
So, tell me neighbor, why you are looking so uptight?
(Uptight, uptight)
No, I ain’t better than drugs in your residence

[Verse 2]
Now look here! This what we finna do
All the neighbor headed neckles over there
And all the pum headed bitches over there
Now look here, say! The bills never lead up
You say we needs our betters
So why you still complaining if the government won’t help us
Quit with all the boo-hoo, go and take a doo-doo
Get that shit up out your system so you can be new-new
Why you gotta complain?
I know for who make chump change
Can still move out the hood
Hit the beach and catch a sun tan
So if you hear me, I said if you really hear me
Talking off the mirror so, uh, you can see clearer, man

[Chorus]
Hello neighbor, why you are looking so uptight?
(Uptight, uptight)
I ain’t going to rob you, and I ain’t going to bother you
So, tell me neighbor, why you are looking so uptight?
(Uptight, uptight)
No, I ain’t better than drugs in your residence
Hello neighbor, why you are looking so uptight?
(Uptight, uptight)
I ain’t going to rob you, and I ain’t going to bother you
So, tell me neighbor, why you are looking so uptight?
(Uptight, uptight)
No, I ain’t better than drugs in your residence
